definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
to sculpt/to carve (jade)/ornate artwork/overly elaborate prose
lit. one arrow, two golden eagles (idiom)/to kill two birds with one stone
lit. fine sculpting (idiom); fig. to work with extreme care and precision

sentences.english: Egg carving handicraft and iron handicraft are the most important two types of product of the company.
sentences.chinese: 公司的主要产品有蛋雕工艺品和铁制工艺品两大类。

sentences.english: Introduce the application of tool detection in machining of NC carving miller.
sentences.chinese: 介绍数控雕铣床加工中对刀仪的应用。

sentences.english: Did cavemen think of their paintings as art?
sentences.chinese: 雕洞穴人认为自己的绘画是艺术吗？

sentences.english: The double images of the eagle deeply reflect the internal contradiction of Du Fu's character.
sentences.chinese: 雕意象的二重性深刻地体现了杜甫人格的内在矛盾。

sentences.english: Each book carving was made using sharp knives , tweezers, and scissors .
sentences.chinese: 每一本书雕都是借助锋利的刀片，镊子和剪刀完成的。

sentences.english: A 10-meter high sculpture of King is carved from the center piece.
sentences.chinese: 马丁路德金10米高的塑像，就雕在花岗石的中间。

sentences.english: At this stage the dominant operator products carve coconut palm and activated carbon.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段主要的经营产品为椰棕和活性炭雕。

sentences.english: In the fine gold beautiful jade fire burns, in the wonderful ice flowers snow carves.
sentences.chinese: 精金美玉火中烧，美妙冰花雪里雕。

sentences.english: On top of the bridge are4 lifelike stone lions.
sentences.chinese: 桥栏上还雕有四只栩栩如生的石狮。

sentences.english: The Cai's lacquer engravings reminiscently remain the unique folk art in southern Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 漆线雕完整地保留闽南独特的民间艺术特色。

sentences.english: Shen Jinli was born into a mainstream sculpture family in Xiamen, South Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 沈锦丽，出生在厦门的一个漆线雕工艺世家。

sentences.english: We saw a Ming dynasty carved wooden pillow in the store.
sentences.chinese: 我们在古玩店看见了一只明代的雕花木枕。

sentences.english: I asked him, is it your own painted carving?
sentences.chinese: 我问他，这是你自己画了雕的吗？

sentences.english: You can never get bored of sand sculptures because there are always new and different ones to look at!
sentences.chinese: 你永远不会无聊，因为总有不同的新沙雕可以看。

sentences.english: But to print a book, many blocks had to be engraved, which was troublesome.
sentences.chinese: 但是每印一本书都要雕大量的版，还是十分费事。

definition: (bird species of China) golden eagle (Aquila chrysaetos)
